name: item-shop-1
headline: Travelling Merchant Comes to Town
article: An old wagon rolled into town today, containing all manner of mystical items. The equally old owner of the store offers to sell you an item from their selection.

outcomes.customDescription: Due to a 'paperwork error' all the guilds requests have been marked as complete.
This 'magical' item points you in the direction of forest cheese, a very real and very tasty thing.
This mystical object shifts itself to the lowest point of any surface. The brawlers are mystified by it's power and play with it endlessly...

modifier.reason: from the Orb of Slope Detection

outcomes.customDescription: "Alrighty, I'll come back another time!"

name: item-shop-2
headline: Travelling Merchant Has Returned
article: An old wagon rolled into town today, containing all manner of mystical items. The equally old owner of the store offers to sell you an item from their selection.

outcomes.customDescription: It’s going to take a while to pay that one off...
These magic beans energise adventurers when made into a bitter potion. We've been awake for 3 days and never felt better!
This little lute plays the most adorable songs. The performers love to sing along.
"Alrighty, I'll come back another time!"

name: item-shop-3
headline: Travelling Merchant Arrives
article: An old wagon rolled into town today, containing all manner of mystical items. "I've been hearing rumours of a strange chest that's been making it's way from town to town in these parts, you heard of it?"

outcomes.customDescription: It glows with a purifying energy... I wonder what it could unlock?
The Outriders have agreed that it's only fair to take turns using it for their subterfuge.
This will make the Diviners self-flagellation parties much more exciting.
"Alrighty, I'll come back another time!"

nextEvent.name: locked-chest
nextEvent.headline: The Chest is Calling
nextEvent.article: Our adventurers have gathered in the local Inn, having recently found a strange chest. Something about what’s inside is calling to them, putting them into a frenzy. "Open it open it open it! We need to see what's inside!"

outcomes.customDescription: The key clicks in the chest, and you feel it send a purifying wave into the chest. All of a sudden, everyone's frenzied desire to open the chest has subsided. Oh, and there's some treasure inside!
The key clicks in the chest, and as the lid smashes open on its own, a red mist starts flooding out in a wave, before finally subsiding. We probably shouldn't have done that...
In a frenzy, a brawler smashed the chest open, triggering a trap vortex, absorbing the treasure inside...
And the adventurer... -1 Brawler (<sprite=0>)
And the entire Inn...

name: item-shop-4
headline: Travelling Merchant Arrives
article: An old wagon rolled into town today, containing all manner of mystical items. "I stole some of these things off an evil wizard! Hope he isn't chasing me..."

outcomes.customDescription: It looks like control words for some strange mechanism...
The chest contains a massive empty space. Adventurers decide to move into the free real-estate.
The Arcanists say these glowing fungi helps them see into other dimensions, we assume this helps their magical research.
"Alrighty, I'll come back another time!"

nextEvent.name: mechanical-golem
nextEvent.headline: Mechanical Golem Wreaks Havoc
nextEvent.article: A monster made of metal has been sent by an evil wizard on a search after his stolen goods

outcomes.customDescription: After some trial and error with the instruction manuals command words, we managed to get it under control. Now it works for us!
We managed to lure into into a blacksmiths furnace, where it overheated and blew up!
The Blacksmith was blown up with it...
It took a few adventurers down before getting bored of the fight and wandering off...

name: mirror-mirror
headline: Mirror Mirror
article: A magic mirror has been brought in by a travelling merchant, its powers unknown, and purpose dubious. The merchant says anyone may step forward to harness its effects (for a fee, of course).

outcomes.customDescription: The scraggly Brawler looks in the mirror to see a dashing hero. Before your eyes they transform! They are adored by their fellow Brawlers...
The Arcanist studies the mirror, before seeing stacks of books start to pour out of the mirror in front of them. These will keep them busy for a while...
A commoner steps forward, and stares in the mirror to see a princess, only to blink away a moment later. I wonder if they'll come back?

nextEvent.name: mirror-mirror-2
nextEvent.headline: The Pauper is a Princess!
nextEvent.article: We received an envoy from a far away kingdom today, with the good news that the commoner who recently vanished into a mirror by a trickster merchant was in fact turned into a princess! She's sent a generous offer in exchange for us sending us all her stuff.

outcomes.customDescription: It's nice to have rich friends for once...
The merchant shrugs, walks right into the mirror, and both of them blink away in a puff of smoke.

name: tarot-cards-1
headline: Fortune Teller Comes to Town
article: A mysterious fortune teller comes to you, holding a selection of tarot cards. "Make a choice, what will your future hold?"

outcomes.customDescription: You touch it, and have a vision of an ominous force arriving in your town...

nextEvent.name: tarot-cards-death
nextEvent.headline: Death Comes!
nextEvent.article: After our ominous tarot reading, our town guards have been on the lookout for any scythe wielding apparitions. An old figure finally wandered in, claiming that they are not looking for any trouble, but have retired and are looking for a quiet town to settle down in. "I liked this place because it seems to get destroyed a lot. I'm retired, but everyone needs a hobby."

outcomes.customDescription: Death joins to protect your town. +1 Adventurer
You touch it, and have a vision of a tower blowing up. You probably should have seen this coming...
You touch it, and have a vision of merriment spreading across your town...
"Those who are blind to the future are not protected by it"

name: tarot-cards-2
headline: Fortune Teller Emerges from the Forest
article: A mysterious fortune teller comes to you, holding a selection of tarot cards. "Make a choice, what will your future hold?"

outcomes.customDescription: You touch it, and have a vision of a divine beacon, leading the way...
You touch it, and have a vision of the burning power of your righteous quest turning away those who would do you harm...
You touch it, and have a vision of a wheel with strange markings, when you spin it...

choices.name: I Don't Need to See My Future

outcomes.customDescription: "Your future will come, whether you are aware of it or not."

name: tarot-cards-3
headline: Fortune Teller Emerges from the Forest
article: A mysterious fortune teller comes to you, holding a selection of tarot cards. "Make a choice, what will your future hold?"

outcomes.customDescription: You touch it, and have a vision of the wonders of the universe being unravelled...
You touch it, and have a vision of a lost adventurer wandering into the middle of a crossroads, blinking away, and in their place a sack of gold. A bargain made...
You have a vision of the forest clearing itself before your eyes, retreating into a beautiful clearing ripe for exploitation...

choices.name: I Don't Need to See My Future

outcomes.customDescription: "Your future will come, whether you are aware of it or not."

name: mercenaries
headline: Mercenaries Arrive
article: A pack of wayward mercenaries arrived, hearing there's coin to be made. They've offered to join our fight or help out in the forest nearby.

outcomes.customDescription: They pour out their wagon, ready to fight...
These traps should keep the monsters from getting 'too' close...
They go out looking for whatever food they can find...

nextEvent.name: mercenaries-hunting
nextEvent.headline: Mercenaries Return With Food!
nextEvent.article: Those mercenaries we sent out have returned with some rations that should keep us going a while longer.

outcomes.customDescription: Fine, I guess we'll come back after the monsters have roughed you up a little, see if you need our help then.

name: genie
headline: A Genies Wish
article: A genie has arrived, and is offering to grant us a wish, for a fair price...

outcomes.customDescription: The genie removes all that has the potential for mass destruction...
Some Adventurers also disappeared, for some reason... -4 Adventurers
The genie sends a wave of calmness across your town. For a moment, everything feels at peace...
The genie pulls from the ether a small flask of delicious liquor, that when poured never empties...
"No no, wait!" the genie yells as it suddenly loses its magical aura. "I had a good thing going there!"
The now unmagical genie decides to stay in your town. +1 Adventurer
